metadata.Title: CVE-2022-38864 on Ubuntu 23.04 (lunar) - medium.
metadata.Description:
Certain The MPlayer Project products are vulnerable to Buffer Overflow via the function mp_unescape03() of libmpdemux/mpeg_hdr.c. This affects mencoder SVN-r38374-13.0.1 and mplayer SVN-r38374-13.0.1.

Update Instructions:

Run `sudo pro fix CVE-2022-38864` to fix the vulnerability. The problem can be corrected
by updating your system to the following package versions:

mencoder - 2:1.5+svn38408-1
mplayer - 2:1.5+svn38408-1
mplayer-gui - 2:1.5+svn38408-1
No subscription required

criterions.comment: mplayer package in lunar, is related to the CVE in some way and has been fixed (note: '2:1.5+svn38408-1').
